news.content:
‚úçÔ∏è As the team is working hard on bringing ThreeFold Grid 3 to mainnet, we thought it would be a good time to remind of What‚Äôs New in TF Grid 3.0!


More About TF Grid 3:


  • üóû Release 3.0.1
  • üåÄ The TF Admin Portal
  • üîç Grid 3 Explorer

Thanks to the farmers acrossed 18 countries üåé who have connected capacity to TF Grid 3 Testnet and to the testers who have deployed more than 1,800 contracts to date.


For those who are interested in testing, please join our testing community.
news.excerpt: As the team is working hard on bringing ThreeFold Grid 3 to mainnet, we wanted to remind you of what's new and what's coming!
